p: The proximate composition of the Anethum sowa root L. is presented in TableÂ 2. The root contained the high crude fibre, carbohydrate and ash with low fat and essential oil. The protein content is found to be moderate and also rich in glutamic acid, glycine and lysine. The moisture content was determined on the fresh weight basis, whereas the organic content was calculated on the dried basis. On the other hand, the water soluble ash was found the higher than the acid insoluble ash.
